welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Imielin, a charming city known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore its beauty and immerse yourself in the local culture. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bielsko-Bialo Kaniow Airfield Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Bielsko-Bialo Kaniow Airfield Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pyrzowice Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Pyrzowice Airport, used for charter and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
